title: 81x35: Negotiations with a Former Agency Employer and 18 U.S.C. § 207(c)
summary: 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) prohibits a former senior employee from representing his new employer in negotiations with his former agency concerning the corporation’s use of subcontractors.  This opinion also discusses the policy statement in 5 C.F.R. § 737.1 implementing 18 U.S.C. § 207(b)(ii) regarding supervisory participation in a government funded project.
